实验007，奇怪地不动……
net = NeuralNetwork([100], training_list, 0.01, 30)
(26, 1430, 26, 0.018181818181818181, 1.0, 0.035714285714285719)
0.32140349569759835
(26, 1430, 26, 0.018181818181818181, 1.0, 0.035714285714285719)
0.32140267942961942
(26, 1430, 26, 0.018181818181818181, 1.0, 0.035714285714285719)
net.set_trainer(0.05, 30)
0.32140004893167456
(26, 1430, 26, 0.018181818181818181, 1.0, 0.035714285714285719)
net.set_trainer(0.1, 30)
0.32139000920482513
(26, 1430, 26, 0.018181818181818181, 1.0, 0.035714285714285719)

(0, 2, 26, 0.0, 0.0, 0)

实验011，18太大

Out[74]: (20, 1057, 26, 0.018921475875118259, 0.76923076923076927, 0.036934441366574325)
Out[75]: 0.077246622090629879
Out[76]: (20, 98, 26, 0.20408163265306123, 0.76923076923076927, 0.32258064516129031)
Out[77]: 0.032643587168369168
Out[78]: (24, 68, 26, 0.35294117647058826, 0.92307692307692313, 0.5106382978723405)
